text.section: With respect to an obligation on or defense to a security, a guarantor is an issuer to the extent of its guaranty, whether or not its obligation is noted on a security certificate.
With respect to a registration of a transfer, issuer means a person on whose behalf transfer books are maintained.

law.history: Repealed and reenacted 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 130, sec. 130, effective January 1, 1997. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 118, sec. 17, effective July 1, 1987. -- Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 77, sec. 8-201, effective July 1, 1960.
